It is an outrage that debt collectors are garnishing wages and Social Security checks for unpaid medical bills and student loans.

We must cancel all medical and student debt—and stop all debt collection right now.

A pandemic is not a time for greed. https://www.theguardian.com/money/2020/mar/28/us-debt-collection-wage-garnishment-coronavirus

This is exactly why I’ve urged the administration to use the Defense Production Act to produce more ventilators now – before it’s too late. Our hospitals and doctors should not have to make decisions about who lives and who dies based on supply.
https://www.politico.com/news/2020/03/27/venitilators-coronavirus-lottery-152574
